item.title: How to Resize Objects in the Microsoft Whiteboard App (Windows 11)
item.description: This tutorial covers: How to Resize Objects: With Mouse With Keyboard Proportionally How to Decrease the Size of an Inserted Shape How to Insert an Unproportional Shape No time to scroll down? Click through this presentation tutorial: See a video tutorial: How to Resize Objects With Mouse Step 1: First select an object. Hover the mouse over one corner, or sizing handle, of the object until the cursor becomes a double sided arrow.
